title: About Me
list: I am a freshman Software Engineer, with specialisation in C++ and Competitive Programming. I have an interest in development and have been working on my App development Skills

list.description: I have practiced solving questions on DSA daily and attending Contests regularly. I have gone from a complete beginner to a 4 star on Codechef, a Pupil on Codeforces and have solved 300+ questions on LeetCode.

I have attended all workshops, and have familiarised myself with JavaScript, Python, Numpy, OpenCV and git/GitHub. I have worked on Open-Source Contribution in Project X repositories to solve simple tasks on the tools taught so far.

list.location: St. Mary's High School (SSC) , Mazagaon, Mumbai.
list.description: This certificate covers all aspects of standard secondary education as mentioned by the Maharashtra State Board of Education.

This certificate covers all aspects of standard higher secondary education, in the branch Science, in the subjects of Physics, Chemistry, Maths and Computer Science as mentioned by the Maharashtra State Board of Education.
